title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.4 - Temporary speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.4 - Temporary speed limits

State Regulations

The regional directors of transportation for the department
are hereby authorized to establish temporary speed limits in highway work
areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
164.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
